errors.error_description: Incorrect command syntax for review_changes.sh script with malformed parameter format
correction_candidates: There is a script `review_changes.sh` which takes in a language code and an optional commit (which defaults to `upstream/main` if omitted).
There is a script `review_changes.sh <language_code> [commit]` which takes in a language code and an optional commit (which defaults to `upstream/main` if omitted).
There is a script `review_changes.sh` that accepts `-l <code>` and `-c <hash>` which takes in a language code and an optional commit (which defaults to `upstream/main` if omitted).
There is a script `review_changes.sh [language] [commit]` which takes in a language code and an optional commit (which defaults to `upstream/main` if omitted).
errors.golden_answer: There is a script `review_changes.sh` which takes in a language code and an optional commit (which defaults to `upstream/main` if omitted).
